experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Set up, maintain, update, and optimize (A/B Testing) hosted sites using a LAMP Stack. Design, develop, code and test client API integrations. Contribute to agile development of project timelines, implementation design specification, system flow diagrams.

experience.title: Front End Developer
experience.description: In charge of the build and design of an internal loss prevention web application. Developing a Loss Prevention Tracking System using a JavaSpring based REST Service and a Reactjs with Redux.

experience.title: Solutions Specialist
experience.description: Manage and lead the implementation/maintenance of customer experience survey programs and reporting interfaces for Fortune 500 Companies.

experience.title: Solutions Analyst
experience.description: Implemented and maintained multiple custom-built survey programs and reporting interfaces for Customer Experience Management (CEM).

about.aboutme: I am a Full Stack Developer with an electrical engineering background. I have 4 years of experience designing, building and maintaining large customer experience programs for Fortune 500 companies. My strengths include teamwork, effective communication, and problem solving. I especially enjoy learning new technologies and working on personal projects. You can find some of these projects below. I am open to opportunies where I can continue to develop my skills.
